name: Renaissance Mech Fight
description:
A 2022 Global Game Jam game.

Michelangelo and Titian are at it again, and you see an opportunity to make some money by playing both sides. As the apprentice to Leonardo Da Vinci, you have access to a whole workshop of impractical siege weaponry. The longer these two fight each other in an all out brawl of Renaissance Mech Madness, the more you can charge them! Make enough money to pay back Da Vinci or face his Wrath!
